item.name: ExchangeRateDifferences
item.query: SELECT BookkeepingAccountingPolicyExchangeRateDifferenceSliceLast.Account, BookkeepingAccountingPolicyExchangeRateDifferenceSliceLast.ExtDimension1, BookkeepingAccountingPolicyExchangeRateDifferenceSliceLast.ExtDimension2, BookkeepingAccountingPolicyExchangeRateDifferenceSliceLast.ExtDimension3 FROM InformationRegister.BookkeepingAccountingPolicyExchangeRateDifference.SliceLast( &Period, Company = &Company AND CarriedOut = &CarriedOut AND Sign = &Sign AND GroupKind = &GroupKind) AS BookkeepingAccountingPolicyExchangeRateDifferenceSliceLast

item.name: GeneralRounding
item.query: SELECT BookkeepingAccountingPolicyGeneralRoundingSliceLast.Account AS GeneralRoundingAccount, BookkeepingAccountingPolicyGeneralRoundingSliceLast.ExtDimension1 AS GeneralRoundingExtDimension1, BookkeepingAccountingPolicyGeneralRoundingSliceLast.ExtDimension2 AS GeneralRoundingExtDimension2, BookkeepingAccountingPolicyGeneralRoundingSliceLast.ExtDimension3 AS GeneralRoundingExtDimension3 FROM InformationRegister.BookkeepingAccountingPolicyGeneralRounding.SliceLast( &Period, Company = &Company AND Sign = &Sign) AS BookkeepingAccountingPolicyGeneralRoundingSliceLast
